summary: After a disputed penalty call in a college football game, experts are debating whether current instant replay systems are sufficient to ensure fair play.
An award-winning actress has released a memoir-style spoken word album, reflecting on her personal and professional life experiences.
A government's decision to withdraw funding from a national sports team due to its controversial stance on a political issue has sparked discussions on the role of politics in sports.
The family of a beloved singer hosted a charity concert in their hometown to commemorate their contributions to the music industry and raise funds for local music programs.
A survey conducted among sports fans indicates a growing preference for attending events that prioritize environmental sustainability and reduce ecological impact.
A famous athlete has initiated a voter registration drive in collaboration with civic organizations, aiming to increase participation among young voters.
